title: Community looking for members
body:
Hey guys,

My friend and I currently run a community on League/Curse. We currently have 30+ members from Bronze to Diamond all playing games from ranked to featured game modes. We are looking for guys that want to take the game seriously at some points and have some fun at other times. Add me in game and i will add you to the team. 

Thanks Decenten

replies.body: Add me into it please :D S1LAS

hi i am interested do u have any kind of communications
besides curse love the idea of ur group would love to help it grow and i have a group of about 30 - 40 as well :) hit me up in game hope 
to hear from u soon
